data.text: SWISS appointed Tamur Goudarzi Pour as the new Chief Commercial Officer (CCO) from January 2019. Markus Binkert, currently CCO of SWISS, will assume new duties as CCO of the Lufthansa hub in Munich.
Say hello to the newest family member – our 26th C Series - Juliet Charlie Romeo! 😍✈ https://t.co/KZID2BVud5
140 children, 1 Airbus A330, 1000 questions and numerous highlights: Find out more about the National Day of the Future at SWISS in our blog post.

SWISS is to expand its partnership with Helvetic Airways, and will deploy up to eight Helvetic Airways Embraer E190-E2 aircraft or similar equipment on its route network from 2019 onwards under wet-lease arrangements. 
Find out more: https://t.co/2H7DOxQfam
